column2: we ordered the thick crust medium size "Lou" (2 slices/person) which was piled up with fresh vegetables that were cooked only slightly so they still held their form. The crust was super crunchy and honestly
column3: the highlight of the pie. After about 1 slice
column4: we all felt so full. One of my friends decided to take her other slice to-go and my other friend and I decided to tough it out and finish it.
